body.p: In evaluating the likely effects of introducing an exception to consolidation for investment entities to IFRS 10, the Board has considered the following factors:

li.p: how the changes to IFRS 10 affect the financial statements of an investment entity;

how those changes improve the comparability of financial information between different reporting periods for an investment entity and between different investment entities in a particular reporting period;
how the changes will improve the quality of the financial information available to investors and its usefulness in assessing the future cash flows of an investment entity;
how users will benefit from better economic decision-making as a result of improved financial reporting;
the likely effect on compliance costs for preparers, both on initial application and on an ongoing basis; and
whether the likely costs of analysis for users are affected.
